The following people contributed to the development of this package:

CERN contributors:
 - A. Abramov
 - X. Buffat
 - R. De Maria
 - G. Iadarola
 - A. Latina
 - K. Paraschou
 - E. Waagaard

The longitudinal matching module is derived from the one of PyHEADTAIL (https://github.com/pycomplete/PyHEADTAIL).
